args: PREFIX demov: <http://demo/verb#>           PREFIX vcard: <http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#>           SELECT ?industry (SUM (?sales) AS ?sum_sales )           FROM </optic/sparql/test/companies.ttl>           WHERE {             ?company a vcard:Organization .             ?company demov:sales ?sales .             ?company demov:industry ?industry           }           GROUP BY ?industry           ORDER BY ?sum_sales
